title: Tick Stream Receive
description: The stream message will contain an epoch value and a quote value, showing latest spot price for the requested symbol. These update messages will arrive with a frequency of up to one second

tick.title: Response of streamer
tick.description: Tick by tick list of streamed data.

id.description: The id field here is a stream id that can be used to cancel this stream using the Cancel An Incoming Stream request.

msg_type.description: This is indicator of return value type.
